item.title: Ruby / ZeroMQ / GO
item.author: olivier.wulveryck@gmail.com (Olivier Wulveryck)
item.description: Abtract I really like go as a programming language. It is a good tool to develop web restful API service. On the other hand, ruby and its framework rails has also been wildly used to achieve the same goal. Therefore we may be facing a “legacy” ruby developpement that we would like to connect to our brand new go framework. 0MQ may be a perfect choice for intefacing the two languages.
